Name: Château d'Angers
Notes: Walls nearly 2,000 feet (610 m) in circumference, incorporating 17 towers originally 130 feet (40 m) high.

Name: Château de Brissac
Notes: Damaged during French Wars of Religion, rebuilt 1611 in baroque style.

Name: Château de Montreuil-Bellay
Notes: Divided into rental units in 1822, restored after 1860.
